app.title: Voice Assistant Pro
app.subtitle: Professional File Management System for Designers

voice.title: Voice Control
voice.description: Click the microphone to start voice recognition, say file names or keywords to open files
voice.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support speech recognition. Please use Chrome, Edge, or Safari for the best experience.

files.title: File Management
files.description: Upload your photos, PDFs, or PPT files and set keywords for each file
files.uploadPrompt: Click the button above to start uploading
files.keywordsPlaceholder: e.g., Photo AA, Design Draft, Client Materials
files.supportedFormats: Supported formats: Images, PDF, PPT files

step1.title: 1. Upload Files
step1.description: Support for images, PDF, and PPT file formats, batch upload available

step2.title: 2. Set Keywords
step2.description: Add easily recognizable keywords for each file, separated by commas

step3.title: 3. Voice Control
step3.description: Say commands like 'Open Photo AA' or 'Show Design Draft' to automatically open files

commands.title: Voice Command Examples:
examples: 'Open Photo AA' - Opens the file named Photo AA
'Show Design Draft' - Opens files containing 'Design Draft' keyword
'View Client Materials' - Opens files containing 'Client Materials' keyword
